ygData.subject: Re: Digest Number 18
ygData.msgSnippet: Big whoop.  You changed a + to a -.  I could change your text as well.  Anyone can.  (Dont make me quote your statement of admitting you sleep with sheep...
ygData.messageBody:
Big whoop. You changed a + to a -. I could change your text as well. Anyone can. (Dont make me quote your statement of admitting you sleep with sheep... 'cause I'll do it.)

Also.. you said my "last" message.. the one quoted below is the last one.

> ----------
> From: John Cuyle[SMTP:johncuyle@...]
> Reply To: eq_wizards@onelist.com
> Sent: Friday, April 23, 1999 10:22 AM
> To: eq_wizards@onelist.com
> Subject: [eq_wizards] Re: Digest Number 18
>
> From: "John Cuyle" <johncuyle@...>
>
> Quotes, both of which are from your own messages.
>
> > I wont let a -PvP into a party that I'm in... and I wouldn't let any cast
> >on me anyway.
> >
> > As far as I am concerned, they are outcasts. I want nothing to do >with
> >them. They simply aren't there. hehe
>
> > > Nope. I wont accept help from a +PvP. rather die. =)~
> > > I dont think they have any business trying to blend with the -PvPs.
> > ...also... so far.. in my clan... I've never been logged on for more
> > than half an hour, and never had to play solo. I have solo'd... but
> >always
> > have to opportunity to group.
>
> I think you can see the contradiction here. Obviously, you don't like
> anyone.
>
> ----- Original Message -----
> From: McCartney, Michael R <Michael.McCartney2@...>
> To: <eq_wizards@onelist.com>
> Sent: Friday, April 23, 1999 9:37 AM
> Subject: [eq_wizards] Re: Digest Number 18
>
>
> > From: "McCartney, Michael R" <Michael.McCartney2@...>
> >
> > Talk about your idiotic idiosyncrasies, eh? haha
> >
> > "If you hate PKs.. go be one." That reasoning is not even worth an
> arguement, so I'm not going to bother argueing with it.
> >
> > Drev
> >
> > --Words of wisdom... "Never argue with an idiot. They drag you down
> to their level then beat you with experience."
> >
> > > From: "John Cuyle" <johncuyle@...>
> > >
> > > Hmm, if you feel so strongly about -PvP you should play on Zek. There
> are
> > > no -PvP there.
> > >
> >
> > ------------------------------------------------------------------------
> > Looking to expand your world?
> > http://www.ONElist.com
> > ONElist has over 115,000 e-mail communities from which to chose!
> >
>
>

> Did you know that ONElist hosts some of the largest lists on the Internet?
> http://www.ONElist.com
> Our scaleable system is the most reliable free e-mail service on the Internet!
